name: EarnBetter
description: EarnBetter is a free AI-powered platform that streamlines job searches by optimizing resumes, matching jobs, and providing tailored application tools.
longDescription: EarnBetter is an AI-driven job search assistance platform designed to empower job seekers by providing free tools to enhance their job application process. Founded in 2022 and based in Lafayette, California, the company aims to level the playing field for job seekers by using generative AI to create professional resumes, cover letters, and interview preparation materials. The platform scans millions of job postings daily to deliver personalized job matches based on user profiles and preferences. By automating time-consuming tasks like resume customization and application autofill, EarnBetter helps users save time and increase their chances of landing interviews. It operates on a mission to support job seekers without financial barriers, earning revenue through employer partnerships when users secure jobs through the platform.
features: AI-driven resume creation reformats and enhances uploaded resumes into professional, ATS-optimized documents in minutes.
Personalized job matching scans millions of job postings daily to recommend opportunities aligned with user profiles and preferences.
Custom cover letter generation creates tailored cover letters for specific job applications to help users stand out.
Interview preparation tools provide AI-generated mock interviews and cheat sheets with company summaries and common questions.
Job application autofill streamlines the application process by automatically filling forms on supported Applicant Tracking Systems.
Job tracking allows users to organize and monitor their job applications within the platform for efficient job search management.
Free access to all features ensures job seekers can use the full suite of AI tools without any cost.
Chrome extension enables users to save jobs from external sites and access EarnBetter’s AI tools for those applications.

faqs.question: Is EarnBetter really free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, EarnBetter is completely free for job seekers, as it earns revenue from employers when users apply or secure jobs through the platform.

faqs.question: How does EarnBetter optimize my resume?
faqs.answer: EarnBetter uses AI to reformat and rewrite uploaded resumes, incorporating professional content and ATS-friendly designs tailored to specific job postings.

faqs.question: Can I use EarnBetter for jobs found on other websites?
faqs.answer: Yes, with the EarnBetter Chrome extension, you can save jobs from external sites and use EarnBetter’s AI tools to create tailored application materials.

faqs.question: What kind of interview support does EarnBetter provide?
faqs.answer: EarnBetter offers AI-generated mock interviews, cheat sheets with company summaries, and common interview questions to boost preparation and confidence.

faqs.question: How does EarnBetter find job matches for me?
faqs.answer: The platform’s AI scans millions of job postings daily to recommend opportunities that align with your skills, experience, and preferences.

faqs.question: Is my personal information safe with EarnBetter?
faqs.answer: EarnBetter prioritizes user privacy, adhering to strict policies and not sharing or selling data without user consent.

faqs.question: Can I customize the resumes and cover letters generated by EarnBetter?
faqs.answer: While EarnBetter’s AI automates much of the process, users can generate tailored documents for specific jobs, though deep customization options may be limited.

faqs.question: Does EarnBetter support remote job searches?
faqs.answer: Yes, EarnBetter can match users with remote job opportunities based on their profile and preferences.
